body:
The cmd "spack create" will change to "spack checksum" if some num in package name.



### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack create kkkk123ccc
```

### Error Message
```console
==> This looks like a URL for kkkk
==> Found 1 version of kkkk:

  123ccc  kkkk123ccc

==> How many would you like to checksum? (default is 1, q to abort)
```
title: spack create failed if there's any num in package name like "kkkk123ccc"
